comments.author: gaetan_yizere@hotmail.com
comments.creator: gaetan_yizere@hotmail.com
comments.raw_text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0b9) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b9
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:2.0b9) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b9

This is a request for enhancement. When right clicking on an open tab or page(not in the page itself), the menu list does not have "Bookmark this page". This enhancement will allow users to bookmark the page they have mouse pointing on the tab.

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1.Not applicable, this is an enhancement.
2.
3.
Actual Results:  
The list does not have "Bookmark this page" on the menu list when right clicking on the tab.

Expected Results:  
This is an enhancement.

This Enhancement will allow users to bookmark the page whether right clicking on the page or the tab.
